name: Swatter
description:
Your allies are mosquitoes, and your foes anything else that's not them. Get rid of the menacing plague of cuter bugs that get in you way! Do you have what it takes to destroy the pests? Find out!

How far will your combo count get? Get ready to rock!

How to play :

BackSpace = RESTART LEVEL
Esc = skip screen/Pause or unpause game.
Left Click : Attack
Right Click: Open the shop to buy more weapons
MIddle Mouse Button: Scroll up and down to switch your currently purchased Weapons.

Game made by :

Gilbert Matos (Me ;) )

and Wikus (the best)

made with Gamemaker Studio 2 in 10 days

Edit: Version 2.0 is now available! give it a try after you've tried the first version submitted for the jam so you can see the improvements! :). Leave your comments down below and enjoy!
